mapper.select: SELECT PNO,ONO,ID,AMOUNT,NAME,EMAIL,IMPUID,PAYMETHOD,APPLYNUM,QUOTA,STATUS ,to_char(TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-mm-ss hh24:mm:ss') timestamp ,CANCLEDATE,PHONENUMBER,POSTCODE,ADDRESS,DETAILADDRESS,REQUESTS FROM TBL_payment WHERE ONO = #{ono}

SELECT PNO,ONO,ID,AMOUNT,NAME,EMAIL,IMPUID,PAYMETHOD,APPLYNUM,QUOTA,STATUS ,to_char(TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-mm-ss hh24:mm:ss') timestamp ,CANCLEDATE,PHONENUMBER,POSTCODE,ADDRESS,DETAILADDRESS,REQUESTS FROM TBL_payment WHERE ONO = #{ono} AND ID = #{id}

SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(TBL_payment IDX_payment)*/ PNO,ONO,ID,AMOUNT,NAME,EMAIL,IMPUID,PAYMETHOD,APPLYNUM,QUOTA,STATUS ,to_char(TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-mm-ss hh24:mm:ss') timestamp ,CANCLEDATE,PHONENUMBER,POSTCODE,ADDRESS,DETAILADDRESS,REQUESTS FROM TBL_payment WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_payment (pno, ono, id, amount, name, email, impUid, payMethod, applyNum, quota, status, phoneNumber, postCode, address, detailAddress, requests) VALUES (seq_payment.nextval, #{ono}, #{id}, #{amount}, #{name}, #{email}, #{impUid}, #{payMethod}, #{applyNum}, #{quota}, #{status}, #{phoneNumber}, #{postCode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress} ,#{requests})
